A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I know that many people in the Star Wars community either some what disliked this movie or just completely hated it \, but I thought loved it. Their were a few things that i thought \"i would probably change that if i was writer/director\"\, but overall\, I thought that Rian Johnson made a wonderful continuation to the Star Wars saga. Is it the greatest film of all time? No. Is it the greatest Star Wars film of them all? No. But is it an overall  good movie with a good story? Yes.
